content.raw:
This is a valid concern.
I think it might be possible to keep the implementation simpler while keeping important functionality:
For example, we could:

* confine frames to a single link, without the possibility of specifying a parent.
* when declaring a pose, limit the use of frames to the current link (or sibling), instead of arbitrary relative paths.

At the least, I would like to be able to define a pose alias within an entity (i.e "forearm" instead of <pose>1 0 0 0 0 0 </pose> ).

This requires more thoughts. Do you have suggestions for simplification?
